description: Non-material amendment of planning permission PP/23/01110 (Replacement of single glazed timber framed sliding sash windows with double glazed timber framed sliding sash windows like for like; replacement of single glazed timber framed french doors and fanlight to balcony with double glazed timber framed french doors and fanlight like for like to front elevation: replacement of single glazed timber framed sliding sash and casement windows with double glazed timber framed sliding sash windows to first and second floors like for like; enlargement of opening to ground floor level and replacement of single glazed timber framed sliding sash window to ground floor with white powder coated aluminium framed patio door and fanlight over to rear elevation. Re-glaze conservatory roof with frameless double glazed panels; re-glaze rear and flank walls with white powder coated aluminium framed bifold doors) to change "re-glaze conservatory roof with frameless double glazed panels" to "replace conservatory glazed roof with insulated flat roof with triple glazed sloping rooflight abutting rear wall of house". Change "enlargement of opening to ground floor level and replacement of single glazed timber framed sliding sash window to ground floor with white powder coated aluminium framed patio door and fanlight over to rear elevation" to "enlargement of opening to ground floor level and replacement of single glazed timber framed sliding sash window to ground floor with white powder coated full height aluminium framed pivoting patio door to rear elevation". Change "bifold doors" to "sliding doors".
